review_data.title: very good
review_data.content: My wife is Indian, so I am a semi-expert on curries and co. King's Kurry i definitely one of the best in town. Butter-Chicken is pro-level.

review_data.title: tasty curries and friendly staff
review_data.content: instead of investing in lots of decoration, effort is clearly put into the cuisine, providing tasty and colorful curries. generally rather expensive but not excessive at all for zurich standards. staff is friendly and attentive. tea choice could be expended.
